entries.meaning: Any lizard of the family Lacertidae.
examples: Lacertid scalation and body forms are similar to those of the teiids, although lacertids are usually smaller.

description: From the name of the first discovered example, BL Lacertae.

entries.meaning: (astronomy) A type of blazar (highly variable active galactic nucleus) that lacks spectral emission lines characteristic of quasars.
examples: In the same diagram a compact galaxy, 3C 371, and a Seyfert, 3C 120, lie very close to the Lacertids.
